name: Bang In The Middle
description:
We are a new age communication company. We take Indian brands global and open Indian markets to Global brands.
We are a full service creative agency that has digital marketing embedded in its core. We bring ideas to life seamlessly across every touch point. We do apps, we do websites, we do search, we do mobile marketing, we also do good old brand communication work for TV and print and radio and everything else. We are possibly the fastest growing independent in NCR.
